source_objects.description: Become a master strategist with courses on the following: business strategy, performance innovation, marketing strategy, customer loyalty and more.

items.headline: Make yourself indispensable; learn the fundamentals of strategy and focus on your company’s most strategic opportunities
objectives_summary: Identify the strategic differentiation and capabilities that set your company apart
Organize work across three organizational systems, and protect your most competitive work
Define your role to make maximum strategic impact on your company’s performance

items.title: Digital Masterclass: How Technology Is Changing The World
items.headline: 12 lessons about disruption, transformation and how these forces are shaping a very different future for everyone
objectives_summary: How the winners of digital disruption created exponential business models
How "the crazy ones" like Elon Musk and Steve Jobs achieve radical product innovation
How firms and governments are driving digital transformation agendas

items.headline: Transforming Culture and Capabilities to Execute Business Strategy: The Agile Way to Business Strategy Success
objectives_summary: To create a process of agile action to achieve strategic business goals.
To align the internal technical systems (work process), social systems, and economic system to achieve business strategy.
To achieve agile adaptation and alignment of the organization's systems, structure, skills, style and symbols.

items.title: Best Practices in Document Management

objectives_summary: Identify the causes of inefficient documentation
Apply a set of best practices to roll out a cost-effective and future-proof corporate strategy for documentation
Champion change management processes related to documentation, from an enterprise analysis perspective

items.title: Business Strategy Development: The Art of Differentiation

Master management consulting tools, techniques and frameworks

objectives_summary: How to prepare, run and follow up workshops when everyone is working from home

items.title: Creating Team Vision, Mission & Values
items.headline: Build a high-performing team with  clear, compelling, and concise Vision, Mission, and Values statements
objectives_summary: Discover the Differences Between Vision & Mission Statements and Why They're Both Important

Explore How Having Vision, Mission, and Values at the Team Level Can Be Valuable

items.title: Business Intelligence with Microstrategy 10 Analytics
items.headline: Learn about Microstrategy 10. A step-by-step course for beginners with exercises and certificate of completion.
objectives_summary: Understand the components and main functionality of Microstrategy and Microstrategy 10.
Load data from different sources (ODBC, Web files, Salesforce etc.) to your Microstrategy application.

items.title: Master Your Mindset & Brain: Framestorm Your Way to Success
items.headline: Excel in any situation. Tweak your mindset in brain-smart ways. Master class in reframing based on neuroscience.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will know the three-step Framestorm method, understand the key neuroscientific principles behind it and be able to apply it powerfully in your daily life

items.title: Digital Strategy Formulation: Become a Strategy Consultant
items.headline: Strategy #1 Digital Transformation - Learn how to formulate Successful Digital Strategies to Grow your Business
objectives_summary: Learn how to formulate successful Digital Strategies
Deliver better business results
Be clear on where your business is now, where it is going and what you need to do to get there

items.title: LinkedIn Basics for Freelancers | Master Your Profile
items.headline: Learn to create a high quality profile, attract your ideal clients, and grow your network in under 60 minutes!
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, students will have a polished profile that helps them stand out from the crowd, connect with others, and maybe even attract clients!
Students will have strategies to help them become known experts in their field on LinkedIn.
Students will also have a strategy and script to help them ask for recommendations stress-free.
